solution_line_template: The two packs of candy cost ${cost_per_pack} x {num_packs} = $<<{cost_per_pack}*{num_packs}={total_cost_candies}>>{total_cost_candies}.
Therefore, Cory needs ${total_cost_candies} - ${cory_has}= $<<{total_cost_candies}-{cory_has}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} to be able to buy two packs of candy.
